eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Entropy
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description:
This provides a behavior with enhancements for platformer objects jump:
* Coyote time, also known as "ledge tolerance", allows players to jump even after their character is no longer touching the ground for a given amount of time. It aims to give players a feeling of control/reduce frustration.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: AdvancedJump
eventsFunctionsExtensions.previewIconUrl: https://resources.gdevelop-app.com/assets/Icons/Line Hero Pack/Master/SVG/Sports and Fitness/Sports and Fitness_training_running_run.svg
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Platformer character jump enhancements like coyote time (allows to jump shortly after leaving a platform).

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Platformer character jump enhancements like coyote time (allow to jump shortly after leaving a platform).
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: AdvancedJump

events.comment: Avoid any side effect if the feature is not used.
The new value will be used next frame.

eventsFunctions.description: Change the coyote time duration in seconds.
eventsFunctions.name: SetCoyoteTime
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change coyote time of _PARAM0_: set to _PARAM2_ seconds

eventsFunctions.description: Check if a coyote jump can currently happen.
eventsFunctions.name: CanCoyoteJump
